data

Class PathManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<City>
          • data.PathManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<City>, java.util.Collection<City>, java.util.List<City>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class PathManager
extends java.util.ArrayList<City>
    Manages the current solution to a path, making it statically available to various classes for statistics collection.
    See Also:
